name: Pokemon Skye Project (BETA)
description:
This game requires a GBA Emulator to run :
These GBA Emulator is recommended
Visual Boy - WINDOWS 32x or 64x (Depends on version)
mGBA - WINDOWS 32x or 64x
Links;
mGBA - https://mgba.io/
Visual Boy Advanced : http://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gba/vboyadvance.html

Note : Original Game : POKEMON FIRE RED, POKEMON LEAF GREEN
